item.title: k8s
item.author: tx991020@gmail.com (andy wu)
item.description: mac 安装minikube brew install kubectl curl -Lo minikube http://kubernetes.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/minikube/releases/v0.25.2/minikube-darwin-amd64 && chmod +x minikube && sudo mv minikube /usr/local/bin/ minikube start --registry-mirror=https://registry.docker-cn.com minikube dashboard
